name: Those Who've Fallen
description:
*Made for Lux Jam 2020

Theme: Light and Shadow

Those Who've  Fallen is a narrative/adventure/shooter in which you play as someone who can see the shadows that lurk in hearts.

Includes NPC interaction, shadow shooting and a final boss

**please note that these are the shadows that lurk in the hearts of others, and therefore they cannot harm you

WASD - movement

LMB - shoot

Space - jump

E - interact

Progress vid/ dev log (kinda)
